title: Revenue: Managing a Bank Account
body:
Revenue: Managing a Bank Account¶

The Maha platform keeps a record of the bank accounts associated with the organization.
Note that this is not an individual users’ bank account information.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Finance

  3. Click Revenue

  4. Click Bank Accounts

  5. Click a bank account to view details, programs, and sales

  6. Click the hyperlinked BrainTree link to open the account in a separate BrainTree tab

  7. Click Programs to view the programs that use the bank account

  8. Click Sales to view sales performance

    • Change time frame by clicking Last 30 Days, Last 60 Days, Year to Date, or Life to Date

    • Hover over a data point to view revenue on a specific date

    • View the amount of money or numbers under Total Revenue, Average Amount, and Transactions

    • Click the dollar amount to the right of a row to view the payments to a bank account

  9. Click and Edit Bank to edit the bank details
